p.n: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets II (3)
p.k: Berlin Richard E Grant explores classic hotels, pleasure palaces and hipster havens in the German capital

p.n: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets II (4)
p.k: New Orleans The actor visits the finest hotels in the Big Easy, including the Monteleone, popular with writers such as F Scott Fitzgerald
76% War and Peace The factual series closes with the turbulent and triumphant 20th century. CGI and drama re-create World War I and Queen Elizabeth II's coronation
79% No Lack of Void The anthrax poisoning of a pickpocket sets Holmes and Watson on an urgent race to prevent a potentially devastating epidemic
79% The Man with the Twisted Lip Sherlock's brother Mycroft (guest star Rhys Ifans) causes tension between Holmes and Watson amid a serious kidnapping case
88% Driving Mr Mossback Nate and Claire collect a body from Seattle, where they stay with Nate's ex-lover Lisa. Meanwhile, Brenda is dragged into her parents' marital troubles
88% The Invisible Woman Ruth is troubled by the death of a woman with no friends or family. Brenda starts writing a novel, and work worries leave Keith
86% Broadway Limited As Nucky's new bootlegging deal with Chalky White leads to bloodshed, Agent Van Alden closes in on Jimmy
86% Anastasia As Jimmy and Al Capone stir up trouble in Chicago, Nucky demands that Elias solves the murder of Chalky White's employee
79% Paint It Black Lucy Liu directs this especially tense episode, in which brothers Sherlock and Mycroft join forces on a case with life-or-death consequences
79% Art In the Blood. A seemingly routine murder case gets an international twist when Holmes crosses paths with MI6. Also, Joan rethinks her future with Mycroft
Blinded By The Light While Dexter juggles everyday marriage and parenting problems, the Trinity Killer strikes again
Dex Takes A Holiday With his family away, Dexter is free to unleash his inner killer, and he's found his next victim
91% The Test Dream Tony is troubled by a dream about his old football coach, until he receives some big news from Chris
91% Long Term Parking With Tony B still missing, tensions between New York and New Jersey are at an all-time high
The Broken Man As the High Sparrow eyes a new target, Jaime meets a hero, Arya makes a plan and the North is reminded

p.n: New: City On A Hill II (8)
p.k: New & Exclusive. Pax Bostonia As Boston mourns another loss, Decourcy pursues justice in and out of the courtroom. Season finale
New & Exclusive. For 'the Captain', the much-feared forties have arrived, as has the opportunity, at the last Derby, to announce his retirement. Italian with subtitles
88% Hold My Hand Unhappy with Claire's carefree behaviour, Ruth freezes her trust fund, inadvertently pushing her further toward Billy's destabilising influence
88% Time Flies It's Nate's 40th birthday and Brenda has a big surprise in store. Meanwhile, Claire finally gets fed up of Billy's erratic behaviour
Bad Blood Sookie gets little help from Eric as she searches for a missing Bill. Meanwhile, Andy persuades Jason to keep quiet about Eggs' death
82% Perverts & ______ Hank stays with Karen and Becca while looking for a new agent
82% The Party Hank gets ready to leave LA but one last drink leads to a series of unexpected events
82% Hell Ain't a Bad Place to Be Hank has new hope in reuniting with Karen, but a visit from his ex-girlfriend Carrie puts this in jeopardy
